data.title: Portland Book Festival
data.meta_description: Literary Arts presents the annual Portland Book Festival every November in downtown Portland, Oregon. Click here for more information.
data.text:
Cover to Cover proposals are now open for 2024! More info here.

Exhibitor booth applications are now open for 2024! More info here.

Book submissions have closed as of June 14, 2024. Titles that have been submitted will be notified whether they have been accepted by September 1.

Author lineup will be announced in mid-September 2024. Sign up for our newsletter to learn more.

Look back at last year’s 2023 event, and learn more at PDXBOOKFEST.ORG

Subscribe to our e-news and continue to check online for the latest news about Portland Book Festival. If you’d like to support the work we do and see Portland Book Festival thrive for years to come, please consider making a tax-deductible gift.
